name: Ninja Jajamaru Collection
overview: Ninja Jajamaru Collection is a compilation of several older games in Jaleco's long-running Ninja Jajamaru series along with one new game: Ninja Jajamaru-kun Jajamaru no Daibōken Jajamaru: Ninpō Chō Jajamaru Gekimaden: Maboroshi no Kinmajou Ninja Jajamaru: Ginga Daisakusen Ninja Jajamaru: The Great Yokai Battle, a brand-new sequel
